trends: There has been one other sighting in Homer City
There were no other sightings in Homer City on or around September 11th 2012
Summary: above the tree line same place for 2 days pulsates various lights and moves abruptly through the air in no pattern extremely quick
divs: Sighting Detailsit has been in the air above the tree line in my back yard for 2 consecutive days between 9pm and 11pm at first i thought it was an airplane or a helicopter but after observing it for a while i had no idea what it was when it was in the sky it move extremely fast and its moves had no pattern moving erratically and pulsed different colors it was brought to my attention by my step dad he called me outside to get my opinion on it since he saw it while he was walking across the road and wanted to make sure he wasn't seeing things when i saw it i didnt want to look away it had me enamored i didnt want to look away almost like i wanted to understand what it was
